1.1.1.en: "You Suffer" trigger fired when Bitcoin price change exceeds the Gitfoyle Threshold configured in app settings.

1.1.2.en: Bitcoin threshold rate change rounded to 1 decimal for readability.

1.1.3.en: Initialization bug fix, removed erratic flow card

1.2.0.en: Costs & revenue also displayed in local currency, % profit capability added

1.2.3.en: Fixed bug when calculating total mining cost

1.4.0.en: rig power mode capability and action card, rig temperature and load capabilities

1.4.1.en: Added status changed trigger card to rigs

1.5.0.en: Enable Autopilot mode to let NiceHash Remote automatically start/stop rigs based on power tariff and profitability

1.5.1.en: Minor bug fixes and code cleanup

1.6.1.en: Fixes rare crash when NiceHash API request fails
